summary: Feature request to add a built-in 'getHandlers' query method to the TypeScript SDK. This issue was closed as a duplicate of #1081, which provides more detailed discussion.
userImpact: Users would be able to discover available query handlers on a workflow, improving debuggability and API discoverability.
resolutionDetails: Closed in favor of #1081 which provides more detailed discussion of the same feature request.
keyQuote: Closing in favor of duplicated #1081 (that other one provide more details).
